english.segment1: VERSE. The Lord is faithful to all his promises. The Lord is loving toward all he has made. The Lord upholds all who fall. The Lord is faithful to all.
english.segment2: VERSE. The Lord is righteous in all his ways. The Lord is loving to all he has made. The Lord is near to all who call. The Lord is faithful to all.
english.segment3: My mouth will speak in praise, in praise of the Lord. Let every creature praise, praise his holy name. My mouth will speak in praise, in praise of the Lord. Let every creature praise, praise his holy name, praise his holy name.
english.segment4: Praise his holy name. Forever, forever, and ever, and ever. Forever, forever, and ever, and ever. Forever, forever and ever. The Lord is faithful, the Lord is faithful. The Lord is faithful The Lord is faithful, the Lord is faithful. The Lord is faithful.
